name: Cryout
description:
Hello everyone,  I am Kelvin. Cryout is a first-person survival horror game developed by me as the honor project of my Game Dev degree at University of Plymouth, UK. I mainly designed the mechanic of the game, so most of the 3D assets and audio clips were third-party assets. I hope you have fun while playing it.

Story:

You are driving your old van, trying to cross the country. Unluckily, you have run of of fuel. You pulled off in front a mysterious house, to see if you can kindly ask whoever living inside to give you some fuel to continue on your journey, but...

Main objectives of the game:
  • Navigate through the in-game scene
  • Unlock puzzles to proceed
  • Hide from the monster(s)!
There are currently THREE levels in-game:
  • Tutorial Level (Highly recommend to play it before playing the main scenes!)
  • The House
  • The Basement
